phrases: To awaken us, the young mankind,
and fight to protect their loved ones
Will set out on their journey as the war rages on.
Slicing through the darkness they fly toward
That blue planet that shines in the distance
Claudia has told Misa of her early days with Roy Focker,
and in those memories, Misa finds reflections of Hikaru and herself.
Maybe I should have used a little more mustard...
Have you been doing okay, Hikaru?
If you had not saved me, I would have...
Hey, it is all over now.
I would love to see you.
Can you come to Highlander City right away?
Well, I sort of made plans...
You are meeting someone who lives in Macross City, right?
Then you can see them anytime!
Nothing unusual to report on patrol.
Say, do you have any plans for your day off tomorrow?
I am flying over the forest zone right now.
If you want, how about coming to see it tomorrow?
We will work out the details when I get back.
I can see them anytime, huh?
If I just explain things, I am sure they will understand.
So you will come then, right?
I guess I am a little early.
I did not recognize you at first in that outfit.
Anyway, hurry up and come over here!
I am sorry for calling you on such short notice.
Was the person you made plans with angry?
Anyway, is it all right for us to be so close?
What if some gossip columnist spots us?
So long as I am with you, I do not care.
With this disguise, no one's going to know it is me.
Even you did not recognize me at first.
So you have got some proper clothes after all.
A friend of my producer owns this place.
A lot of celebrities come here.
I guess you are a full-fledged celebrity now, huh?
I have been for a while, thank you.
So where is your manager today?
He is out setting up some work for me.
It is not much, but I wanted to thank you for saving me.
No, you do not have to thank me.
Do not say anything and just take it.
Is it true that Major Hayase and Captain Ichijo are out on a date?
I bet the two of them are spending a romantic day off right now!
Come on, stop being so insensitive!
It is none of your business what Major Hayase is doing.
The less popular the girls, the more insensitive they are.
I will take good care of it.
It goes great with your outfit.
But is not it just a little long?
You could have brought those a little later.
But you young people always seem to be in such a hurry.
How many years has it been since we were alone like this?
The last time was just after that mission, so...
I think it is been around two years.
It seems short but it is actually a long time, huh?
It is better to think of it as a short time that just seems long.
But you do not feel the same way you did then, do you?
I may never see you again, so I will just say it.
You cannot just drop something like that out of the blue...
I am sorry, today we are...
I thought you would be here.
I found a job, but it is right now.
You are a professional, are not you?
Is that any way to act?
Minmay, if this is a bad time, I can come back later.
You are acting like a spoiled child!
Well, now I am all tipsy.
There is no way I could work!
I guess I have ruined your little date.
I will apologize properly later, but for now do not worry about the bill.
You have already had too much.
If he is not at home either, then where could he be?
If there was a scramble, they would have called me in too.
Watch where you are going, you dumb jerk!
Maybe he was in an accident!
Actually, it is just a personal matter.
Do you know where Captain Ichijo is?
Surely you have a much better idea of where Captain Ichijo is than I would, Major!
With a personality like that, no woman will ever fall for you!
They would not even go out with you!
I do not see anybody going out with you!
I bet Misa's already gone home by now.
From here on out it is off limits.
Then could you tell me another way to get to the airport?
There are some Zentradi on the rampage at the airport right now!
Now you know, so just go on back.
I hope I am not too late.
What do you think of that?!
I cannot land in this situation!
What on earth could he be doing?
I hope you realize what we had to do.
Authorizing you to take command of this operation is a very special case!
I expect to see that reflected in your work out there.
Do you have things wrapped up over there?
Captain Ichijo, what should we do with these guys?
Lock them up in a hangar or something.
Headquarters will deal with them later.
If I do not apologize to her today, she will never speak to me again.
You can smell what is in there, cannot you?
I am really sorry about today!
I cannot believe you are still here.
The forest park is closed by now
but why do not we go someplace and eat these sandwiches?
Something came up all of a sudden, and...
That is okay, but I wish you had at least called me.
You are wrapping that around the wrong person.
You have got it all wrong!
Good evening, ladies and gentlemen of South Coast City!
Congratulations on receiving the right of self-government
Today, to celebrate your first step toward autonomy,
Miss Lynn Minmay has rushed all the way here to South Coast City!
Here is her old favorite, My Boyfriend is a Pilot!
I do not want to sing today!
Ever since you showed up, Hikaru and I have grown farther apart.
You have not changed at all,
How did your audience feel as they were going home just now?
Your songs do not belong to you alone.
It is easy to say that, but...
When your songs have a kindness that projects concern for people's feelings...
then you will be a real singer.
These past two years, I have worked in my own way to hear those real songs of yours.
I probably will not see you for a long time.
One of these days, let me hear a song that is filled with kindness.
It is Christmas time, and news has spread of Minmay's disappearance.
Meanwhile, Kamujin and his men have attacked Onogi City.
I will not follow it anymore
The shadow you cast as you run away
We all keep running to the end
But we still cannot see the goal
Even now, I keep running toward
The light that shines so far away
